comments.text:
Wow I literally thought I was gonna hate this song but no I like it a lot I 
put on My CC and read what the lyrics was about damn it truly is like a 
movie or a book a romantic thriller that got me smiling on how well this 
song stuck to that theme ! I knew what I hated it was thought awful clothes 
that don't do this song justice I mean no the clothes are hot fo real it 
just doesn't go with this song at all I would have gave them a rockabilly 
look it played more with the seductive playful tone to the song on how bad 
they were but hot hot they tend to be ! In my opinion I think the stylist 
kinda ruined the song in this aspect because I assumed it would be yet 
again another sad,dark vampyre song.not bad but just to many done .this is 
nothing of what I expected.Great with those vocal ranges that would go from 
dark to seductively comdey. ﻿
